module.name: samba
module.summary: SMB and CIFS client/server programs for UNIX and name Service Switch daemon for resolving names from Windows NT servers.

template.name: samba_per_role_template
template.summary: The per role template for the samba module.

desc.p: This template allows smbd to manage files in a user home directory, creating files with the correct type.
This template is invoked automatically for each user, and generally does not need to be invoked directly by policy writers.

param.name: userdomain_prefix
param.summary: The prefix of the user domain (e.g., user is the prefix for user_t).

interface.name: samba_domtrans_net
interface.summary: Execute samba net in the samba_net domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: samba_run_net
interface.summary: Execute samba net in the samba_net domain, and allow the specified role the samba_net domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the samba_net domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the samba_net domain to use.

interface.name: samba_domtrans_smbmount
interface.summary: Execute smbmount in the smbmount domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: samba_read_config
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read samba configuration files.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed access.

interface.name: samba_rw_config
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read and write samba configuration files.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed access.

interface.name: samba_read_log
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read samba's log files.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed access.

interface.name: samba_exec_log
interface.summary: Execute samba log in the caller domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: samba_read_secrets
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read samba's secrets.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed access.

interface.name: samba_search_var
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to search samba /var directories.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed access.

interface.name: samba_rw_var_files
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read and write samba /var files.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed access.

interface.name: samba_write_smbmount_tcp_sockets
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to write to smbmount tcp sockets.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed access.

interface.name: samba_rw_smbmount_tcp_sockets
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read and write to smbmount tcp sockets.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed access.

interface.name: samba_domtrans_winbind_helper
interface.summary: Execute winbind_helper in the winbind_helper domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

interface.name: samba_run_winbind_helper
interface.summary: Execute winbind_helper in the winbind_helper domain, and allow the specified role the winbind_helper domain.

param.name: domain
param.summary: The type of the process performing this action.

param.name: role
param.summary: The role to be allowed the winbind_helper domain.

param.name: terminal
param.summary: The type of the terminal allow the winbind_helper domain to use.

interface.name: samba_read_winbind_pid
interface.summary: Allow the specified domain to read the winbind pid files.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed access.

param.name: domain
param.summary: Domain allowed access.

desc.p: Allow samba to modify public files used for public file transfer services.
Allow samba to export user home directories.
Allow samba to export NFS volumes.
